ygData.subject: Re: thinking about EQ
ygData.msgSnippet: Kharl-- the tutorial is part of the game load-- you should try it, as it s pretty fun and funny. I bet it took you awhile to figure out the game mechanics w/o
ygData.messageBody:
Kharl-- the tutorial is part of the game load--
you should try it, as it's pretty fun and funny. I
bet it took you awhile to figure out the game
mechanics w/o the tutorial-- even WITH doing it twice, i
still took some time before i got the hang of all the
different commands. <br><br>You actually thought you were
only going to play for a month?? I wanted to get onto
EQ for about 6months before i did (had to get a new
computer to play it). I realized back then (and more so
after day one of playing) that it would be a commitment
of several years-- hahaha). <br><br>X.
